title: The Best Jeans For Every Body Type, Budget, and Vibe
description: No matter how the trends and seasons change, there's just one wardrobe essential we will never retire from our closets - and that's a pair of cool, trendy jeans. When it comes to denim, we all know there are an endless number of washes, cuts, and sizes to shop. From deciding between light-wash versus dark-wash jean styles to finding your perfect silhouette in the form of skinny jeans, stretchy jeans, flared jeans, bootcut jeans, and even straight-leg jeans, there are so many factors to take into account, which is why our team of shopping experts is here to help you find the best women's jeans to add to your rotation. Whether you're searching for an of-the-moment denim style, like a barrel leg pant or a wide-leg pair; something flattering and high-waisted; or even the perfect pair of vintage-looking denim, we've found them all. Our favorite picks for 2025 include classic Levi's, designer brands, as well as affordable options under $100. The best part is that prices start at just $42, so you may even be able to pick up two pairs. Whether you're looking for something timeless or want to switch it up with a modern style, these options will team beautifully with all of your favorite basics, like a classic tank top or a favorite sneaker. Keep reading to find your next go-to pair of jeans from our curated list.
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: Shop our favorite pairs of jeans this season.
text: — Additional reporting by Angela Elias and Anvita ReddyKyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally. On any given day, you can find Kyley shopping out fashion trends, reviewing her new favorite products, interviewing celebrities, and watching old Nora Ephron movies with her cats — because it's all about balance!.Anvita Reddy (she/her) is an assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and is an avid reviewer of everything including home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. She has tried and tested plenty of skin-care, makeup, hair-care, and countless other beauty products. She previously worked at Business Insider as a Social Media Fellow and freelance writer. She graduated from the University of Connecticut with a Bachelor's of Science in Psychology and went on to pursue a Masters in Communication and Media from Rutgers University. In her free time, she's binge-watching everything from reality TV to riveting shows, sharpening her cooking skills, working out, or traveling.Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments on TV Guide Network and video content for brands like Pier 1 and Walgreens. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.
